root.name: Sword of the Stars: A Murder of Crows
root.description: Expansion package detailsA New Sixth race – The MorrigiNew Ship Sections - Over a dozen new ship sectionsUnique ‘Grav Flock’ Drive System for Morrigi15 new weapons27 new technologies and the new Xeno-Cultural and Drones tech treeDrone carrying ships in all three size classesConstruction ships, a variety of orbital stations, spy ships, police cutters, and moreA whole new set of GUI enhancements and additionsPC System RequirementsOperating System: Microsoft® Windows® 2000/XP/VistaProcessor: 1.5 Ghz Intel® Pentium® or equivalentMemory: 1 GB RAM (2 GB for Vista)Hard Disk Space: 3 GB AvailableVideo Card: DirectX® 9 compliant video card with 128MB RAMSound Card: DirectX® 8.1 or better compatibleDirectX® Version: DirectX® 9cInternet Connection: at least 56k modemMultiplayer Requirement: Gamespy key (provided by publisher)
